Package ch.nolix.core.interfaces

Interface IFluentObject<FO>

  • Type Parameters:
    FO - The type of a fluent object.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    _3DGUI, Area, BackgroundWidget, BaseShape, BlackNBlueDesign, BlackRedConsoleDesign, BorderWidget, Button, CheckBox, ConfigurableElement, Configuration, ConfigurationElement, Console, Container, Cuboid, DeepConfiguration, DefaultDesign, Frame, GreenConsoleDesign, GreenDesign, GreyBlueConsoleDesign, GUI, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InvisibleGUI, JMonkeyMainFrame, Label, Line, MainFrame, MultiShape, MutableElement, NamableElement, OptionalNamableElement, Shape, SingleContainer, Sphere, Stack, StandardConfiguration, TabContainer, TabContainerTab, TextBox, TextLineWidget, VerticalLine, VerticalStack, VisibleGUI, Widget

    public interface IFluentObject<FO>
    A fluent object is an object that can return itself casted to its concrete type.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
